EXW.name: Ex Works
EXW.description: The seller makes the goods available at their premises. The buyer bears all costs and risks of moving the goods to the destination.
EXW.responsibilities: Buyer covers all costs and risks from the seller's door.

FCA.name: Free Carrier
FCA.description: The seller delivers the goods to the carrier or another person nominated by the buyer at the seller's premises or another named place.
FCA.responsibilities: Seller is responsible for loading goods onto the buyer's carrier.
FCA.risk_transfer: When goods delivered to the carrier at the named place
FCA.cost_transfer: When goods delivered to the carrier at the named place

FAS.name: Free Alongside Ship
FAS.description: The seller delivers when the goods are placed alongside the vessel nominated by the buyer at the named port of shipment.
FAS.responsibilities: Seller covers costs until goods are alongside the ship.
FAS.risk_transfer: When goods are placed alongside the ship
FAS.cost_transfer: When goods are placed alongside the ship

FOB.name: Free On Board
FOB.description: The seller delivers the goods on board the vessel nominated by the buyer at the named port of shipment.
FOB.responsibilities: Seller covers costs until goods are on the ship. Buyer covers everything after.
FOB.risk_transfer: When goods are on board the vessel
FOB.cost_transfer: When goods are on board the vessel

CFR.name: Cost and Freight
CFR.description: The seller delivers the goods on board the vessel and pays the costs and freight to bring the goods to the named port of destination.
CFR.responsibilities: Seller pays freight to destination port; Buyer assumes risk once goods are on board.
CFR.risk_transfer: When goods are on board the vessel

CIF.name: Cost, Insurance, and Freight
CIF.description: The seller delivers the goods on board the vessel and pays the costs and freight to bring the goods to the named port of destination, including insurance.
CIF.responsibilities: Seller covers freight and insurance to the destination port.
CIF.risk_transfer: When goods are on board the vessel

CPT.name: Carriage Paid To
CPT.description: The seller delivers the goods to the carrier and pays for carriage to the named place of destination.
CPT.responsibilities: Seller pays for carriage to destination; Buyer assumes risk once goods are with the first carrier.
CPT.risk_transfer: When goods are delivered to the first carrier

CIP.name: Carriage and Insurance Paid To
CIP.description: The seller delivers the goods to the carrier and pays for carriage and insurance to the named place of destination.
CIP.responsibilities: Seller pays for carriage and insurance to destination; Buyer assumes risk once goods are with first carrier.
CIP.risk_transfer: When goods are delivered to the first carrier

DAP.name: Delivered at Place
DAP.description: The seller delivers when the goods are placed at the disposal of the buyer on the arriving means of transport ready for unloading at the named place of destination.
DAP.responsibilities: Seller covers all costs/risks until arrival at the named place, except unloading and import clearance.
DAP.risk_transfer: At named place of destination (ready for unloading)
DAP.cost_transfer: At named place of destination (ready for unloading)

DPU.name: Delivered at Place Unloaded
DPU.description: The seller delivers when the goods, once unloaded, are placed at the disposal of the buyer at a named place of destination.
DPU.responsibilities: Seller covers all costs/risks including unloading at destination, except import clearance.

DDP.name: Delivered Duty Paid
DDP.description: The seller delivers the goods to the buyer, cleared for import and not unloaded from any arriving means of transport at the named place of destination.
DDP.responsibilities: Seller covers all costs and risks including import duties and taxes.
DDP.risk_transfer: At named place of destination (ready for unloading)
DDP.cost_transfer: At named place of destination (cleared for import)
